extendedInfo.description: With main focus on volume and volatility based technical indicators our V-Charts have full set of indicators for technical analysis of stocks, ETFs and indexes.  Java based web version of these chart could be found on our web site (www.v-charts.com). Web based V-Charts are completely compatible with our V-Charts mobile app: whatever you do and save on your computer (set of technical indicators, analytical drawings and etc.) could be later accessed and worked with via our mobile V-Charts app. Our V-Charts is free mobile addition to our main charting service (web-based Java stock charts)With our V-Charts you will be able: - monitor stock market; - perform technical analysis; - save your work as chart styles; - set sound and email alerts triggered by technical indicators.With our V-Charts you will a have access to  - monitor stocks in various frames (from 1-minute bars up to the monthly bars); - analyze candles, Heikin-Ashi candlesticks and etc; - analyze more than 100 popular technical studies; - analyze unique volatility, volume and advance/decline indicators; - and much moreâ¦After you get you V-Charts app, if you are not already our subscriber,  you will be asked to register on  www.v-charts.com to receive username and password. Keywords: stock market, charts, stock charts, technical analysis, stocks, index charts, technical indicators, studies, market analysis, market charts, investing, trading, stock, chart, charting, stock trading.

reviews.title: Charts good
reviews.comment: Charts are good. The previous guy who complained about registration is wrong. I would rather register on their website and give them the info I consider i shous give insted of letting to scan my personal info on my mobile device. In permissions they ask for internet access only. I,m not going to be srprised I because of that complint they will remove registration and will start to scan our devices. Lets hope it will no happen. I like the charts, they are greate. If you are trading these charts for you
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fonts too small to read on tablet
reviews.comment: Acer A700 10.1 tablet... fonts are too small to be useful.  Uninstalled
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Full list of studies, drawings and most important alerts on any indicator. Yes, you have to register, but it worth it. The most important they do not ask to access your personal info on our device.
reviews.author: Victoria H
